name: Danda Satya Naga Sathwik
college: S.R.M Institute of Science and Technology - Amravati Campus

certifications.title: Python for Machine Learning and Data Science Master Class

education.school: S.R.M Institute of Science and Technology - Amravati Campus
education.field_of_study: Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

projects.name: Celebrity Image Generation using DCGANs
projects.description: Implemented a research paper on Deep Convolutional Generative Adversarial Networks (DCGANs) to generate realistic images. Fine-tuned hyperparameters and experimented with various configurations to enhance the quality of generated images. Integrated findings into a comprehensive report detailing model architecture, training process, and results analysis. Conducted thorough evaluations and analyses of generated images, comparing them with ground truth data using deep learning frameworks.

projects.name: PathFinderX: Interactive Pathfinding Visualizer
projects.description: Developed a web-based pathfinding visualizer tool using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to demonstrate various pathfinding algorithms. The tool allows users to visualize the process of finding the shortest path between two points on a grid using algorithms such as A* (A-star), Breadth-First Search (BFS), and Depth-First Search (DFS). Integrated interactive features to allow users to draw obstacles, specify start and end points, and initiate pathfinding simulations. Leveraged event-driven programming in JavaScript to update the grid dynamically during pathfinding simulations and provide real-time visualization feedback.

projects.name: High-Resolution Image Enhancement with SRGANs
projects.description: Developed a system for improving the quality and details of low-resolution images by generating corresponding high-resolution versions using SRGANs. Fine-tuned hyperparameters and utilized generative adversarial networks (GANs) to learn high-frequency details and textures in low-resolution images.

experiences.description: Implemented an image generation project focusing on Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs). Collaborated with a team of interns to design and implement a GAN architecture for synthesizing realistic images. Conducted extensive research on GAN frameworks, including DCGAN, SRGAN to identify the most suitable approach for the project objectives.

Designed and implemented an advanced object detection model to recognize and report accidents in images and videos. Implemented an automated email notification system to alert authorities on accident detection. Crafted email notifications containing crucial details: Date and time stamp for chronological incident organization. Attached image capturing the accident scene at the moment of detection.

full_output.name: Danda Satya Naga Sathwik
